!title: Green Thai Chicken Curry
!size: 2 portions
!author: Andreas Wallner
!source: about.com Thai Food (http://thaifood.about.com/od/thairecipes/r/greencurrychick.htm)
!lang: en

* 4 green chilies
* 2 shallots
* 4cloves garlic
* 1cm ginger
* 1stalk lemongrass
* 1/2tsp corianderseeds
* 1/2tsp cuminseeds
* 1tsp shrimp paste
* 1/2bunch coriander/cilantro
* 1/2tsp white pepper
* 3tbsp fish sauce
* 1tsp brown sugar
* 2tbsp lime juice
- process to paste with food processor or pestle and mortar
- fry of the curry paste

* 700g chicken, cubed
* 450ml coconut milk
* 4 kaffir lime leaves, strips
- add to paste, simmer until nearly done

* 1 red bell pepper, cubed
- add, continue to simmer

* 1 zucchini, cubed
- add, continue to simmer

* thai basil
- add, serve with rice
